existing_features.title: Create a responsive NGO marketing website with these top-level pages/sections: Home, About, Programs/Impact, Get Involved (Volunteer), Donate, and Contact.
Apply a cohesive visual theme appropriate for an NGO and enforce it consistently across the site (color palette, typography, spacing, buttons, section layout). Do not use a blue/purple theme.

Implement the Home page with: a hero section (headline, short mission statement, primary CTA buttons), a quick impact metrics strip, featured programs preview, and a latest updates/news preview area (static content is acceptable for initial build).
Implement an About page that includes mission, vision, values, and a small team/leadership section (static content for initial build).
Implement a Programs/Impact page that lists at least 3 programs with a title, short description, and impact details (static content for initial build).
Implement a Get Involved (Volunteer) page with a volunteer interest form (name, email, area of interest, availability, message) and submit it to the backend for storage.
Implement a Contact page with a contact form (name, email, subject, message) and submit it to the backend for storage.

Implement a Donate page that clearly explains donation options and includes a non-payment “pledge” form (name, email, amount, optional message) stored in the backend. Do not integrate any payment provider in this initial build.

Add a footer with NGO basics (short mission line, quick links, social placeholders, and contact info placeholders) and ensure consistent accessibility basics (semantic headings, labeled inputs, focus styles).
Generate and include required static image assets in the frontend and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images through the backend).
